project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their score, and displays the score at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Define the structure for questions and answers, including options.
Implement the user interface for starting the quiz and displaying questions.
Implement the logic for taking user input for answers and tracking the score.
Implement the summary display at the end of the quiz to show the user\'s score.
Write tests for the quiz game to ensure that questions are displayed correctly and scores are calculated accurately.
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure all features function correctly.
